utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Shh.. Go back to sleep. I have to go home.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. This was amazing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It really was. You've learned some new moves!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well, this guy at work gave me "Sex for Dummies" as a joke.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who's laughing now?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Breathe, breathe, breathe... Good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Next time, can I say breathe?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, last time you said it like Dracula, and it scared her! Can I get you anything? You want some more ice chips?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: No, I'm okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, I'll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: To use the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You can't leave me alone with her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is exactly the kind of social situation that I am not comfortable with!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What kind of social situation are you comfortable with?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's just that we've never spent any time, you know, alone together.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You'll be fine. Nah, you won't, but I'll be back in two minutes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, ah... Any plans for the summer?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I don't know. Maybe church-camp?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hah. May not wanna mention this. So, you ever wonder which is worse, you know; going through labor or getting kicked in the nuts?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it's just interesting. You know, because no one will ever know, because no one can experience both.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: One of life's great, unanswerable questions. I mean, who knows? Maybe there's something even more painful than those things? Like this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Morning.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What's that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's my house-warming present for Monica and Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's a baby chick and duck!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-huh. And I named them Chick Jr. and Duck Jr.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I did not see that coming.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I figure they'll love it at the new house, you know? It has that big backyard. And then, when they get old, they can go to that special farm that Chandler took the other chick and duck to.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. It's a shame people can't visit there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That is the rule, though.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Guess what? You're almost an uncle!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, Erica went into labor last night. Monica and Chandler are at the hospital right now!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, and I have a definite feeling it's gonna be a girl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, you were sure Ben was gonna be a girl.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Have you seen him throw a ball?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is Rachel here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, I think she's still asleep. Hey, hey, how did it go with you guys last night? She seemed pretty pissed at you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, we, y'know, we worked things out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What's that smile? Did something happen with you two?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I'm not one to kiss and tell, but I'm also not one to have sex and shut up. We totally did it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God. You and Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, it's pretty great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what does that mean? Are you guys getting back together?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I.. I don't know. We didn't really get to talk.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But do you wanna get back together?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know. It was incredible. I mean, it just felt so right. When I was holding her, I mean, I never wanted to let her go. You know what? Yeah, I do. I wanna be together.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: YAY!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Shhh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, so is she still going to Paris?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, I hadn't thought of that. I hope not.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, this is like the best day ever. Ever! You guys might get back together, Monica and Chandler are getting their baby, there are chicks and ducks in the world again! Oh, I feel like I'm in a musical! "Daa - raa... When the sun comes up, bright and beaming! And the moon comes..."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Morning!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Guess we'll never know how it ends.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey. How did you sleep?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good. You?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I bet you did!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh. Would you guys mind giving us a minute?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure, yeah. Will you just keep an eye on the chick and the duck?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chick and the duck? Didn't they die...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Dive. Yeah, they dove head-first into fun on the farm.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Morning.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You too. Last night was just wonderful.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It really was.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I woke up today with the biggest smile on my face.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, me too. It was... You know, it was like one of those things you think is never gonna happen, and then it does, and it's everything you want it to be.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh. I know. It was just, it was just the perfect way to say goodbye.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's just a little bit more, honey.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Help me! This hurts!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is it really that bad?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Uh-huh! I think it's time to kick you in the nuts and see which is worse!

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: The baby's head is crowning.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! Oh my God! That is the most beautiful top of a head I have ever seen! Chandler, you have to see this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, you don't wanna miss this. This is the birth of your child! It's the miracle of life!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright. Wow, that is one disgusting miracle.

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: Start pushing. Here we go. Here come the shoulders...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's a... It's a boy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Is he okay?

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: He's just fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, you did it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's a baby! A beautiful little baby! And some other stuff I'm gonna pretend I don't see.

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: Would you like to cut the umbilical cord?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, that's spongy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, hey handsome! Oh, I'm gonna love you so much that no woman is ever gonna be good enough for you! Oh, we are so lucky!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know. He has your eyes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I mean, I know that's not possible, but he does.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: We'll just get him cleaned up a bit.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, he's beautiful. Thank you so much.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I'm really happy for you guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How do you feel?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I'm tired!

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: Well, you don't have that much time to relax. The other one will be along in a minute.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I... I'm sorry, who should be along in a what now?

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: The next baby should be along in a minute.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We only ordered one!

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: You know it's twins, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, yeah! These are the faces of two people in the know!

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: I can't believe you didn't know it's twins! This has never happened before.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, gosh. That makes me feel so special and good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait, did you know it was twins?

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: Yeah, it's here in the paperwork we got from the clinic in Ohio.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Anybody tell you?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I don't think so. Although, they did mention something about two heartbeats. But I thought that was just mine and the baby's. They kept saying both heartbeats are really strong, and I thought well, that's good 'cause I'm having a baby.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is unbelievable.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Twins actually run in my family.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Interesting! Can I see you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What do we do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you mean "what do we do"?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Twins! Twins!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, you're panicking!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-huh! Join me, won't you?! Okay, what do you say we keep one, and then just like have an option on the other one?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We can't split them up!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why not? We could give each of them half a medallion, and then years later, they'll find each other and be reunited. I mean, that's a great day for everybody.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, what if the person who adopts the other one is horrible?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What if they're not? What if it's adopted by a king?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, because I hear the king is looking to adopt.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica, we are not ready to have two babies!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That doesn't matter! We have waited so long for this. I don't care if it's two babies. I don't care if it's three babies! I don't care if the entire cast of "Eight is Enough" comes out of there! We are taking them home, because they are our children!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. Shhh...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: It looks like we're about ready over here.

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: Come on, Erica, start pushing again now.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Ow!

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: Here she comes!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She? It's a girl?

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, now we have one of each! And that's enough!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And then she said it was the perfect way to say goodbye.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! What did you say?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nothing! What do you say to that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, you've got to tell her how you feel!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No way!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You can't just give up! Is that what a dinosaur would do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, I'm just trying to speak your language.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, Rachel doesn't know that you wanna get back together. If she did, she might feel differently. She might not even go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You really think so?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm telling you! Oh, okay! This is the part of the musical where there'd be a really good convincing song. "Bam-bam, don't take no for an answer. Bam-bam, don't let love fly away. Bam-bam-bam-bam..."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Can't a girl finish a song around here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! So I just dropped Emma off at my mom's.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you're not taking her with you tonight?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, we decided that I would go ahead and set up first, and then my mom would bring Emma to Paris on Sunday.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow, eight hour flight with a one-year old? Good luck, mom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you kidding? Eight hours with my mother talking about Atkins? Good luck, Emma!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Alright, you know what? You're right. I should at least tell her how I feel.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross, wait!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Could you get me a muffin?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: I... I know you're leaving tonight, but I just have to tell you. I love you.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: I... I don't know if that changes your plans at all, but I thought you should know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Gunther... Oh... I love you too. Probably not in the same way, but I do. And, and when I'm in a café, having coffee, or I see a man with hair brighter than the sun, I'll think of you. Aw.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... Bye guys.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Unbelievable!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you know what might help?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm not getting you a muffin!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you think they recognize each other from in there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe. Unless they're like two people who have lived in apartments next to each other for years, and then one day they're pushed through a vagina and they meet.

utterance.speaker: Nurse
utterance.content: We're going to take Erica to recovery now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There's something that we wanna tell you. We decided to name the girl-baby Erica.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Oh my God, that's just like my name!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Son of a gun, it is!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Anyway, I'm gonna go and get some rest. I'm really glad I picked you guys. You're gonna make great parents. Even Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, well, bye!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We'll call you!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Have fun at church-camp!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, look at these little bunnies!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know! You ready to trade?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, let's see..

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We could trade later.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, what are you working on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's a... It's a "welcome home" sign for the baby.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How sweet! Oh, is that the baby?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I sat in the paint.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey. So, did you talk to Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, and I'm not going to.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because she's just going to shoot me down. You guys saw what happened with Gunther. That did not look like fun.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How can you compare yourself to Gunther? I mean, sure, he's sexy in a more obvious way. You have a relationship with her, you slept together last night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, and she still wants to go! It's pretty clear where she is.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I know what you mean. I mean, sometimes...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh, Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damn it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, even if I were gonna tell her, I don't have to do it now. Okay? I'll be seeing her again. We've got time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, you don't! She's going to Paris! She is going to meet somebody. Do you know how many hot guys there are in Paris? It's... It's a city of Gunthers!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! What do you have there?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh, I made a little something. If I had more time to work on it, it'd be better, but..

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! You did that yourself?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Honey, that's gorgeous!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You know, the baby can't read, Mike!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! You guys, the car-service just got here. I can't believe they're not home yet! I have to catch my stupid plane. I wanna see the baby!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica just called from the cab. She said they should be here any minute. And apparently, there's some big surprise.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, did she sound happy about it? 'Cause my friend Ethel's baby was born with a teeny, tiny beard.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Oh my gosh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, so what is the big surprise?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What... What...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, awkward question. The hospital knows you took two, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, it's twins!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, they're so cute! Now, what, what kinds are they?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is a boy, and that's a girl.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Her name is Erica.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aw..

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, that pregnant girl's name was Erica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. It's a shame you two didn't get to spend more time together.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, we named the boy Jack after dad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Aw, he's gonna be so happy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, Jack Bing. I love that. Ooh, it sounds like a '40s newspaper guy, you know? "Jack Bing, Morning Gazette. I'm gonna blow this story wide open!"

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my gosh. Wow, so beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I want one.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Well, tell me which one, and I'll try slip it in my coat.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Seriously. Wanna make one of those?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: One? How about a whole bunch?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Ooh, we could teach them to sing, and we can be like the Von Trapp family! Only without the Nazis. Although that sounds kinda dull.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, you guys, I can't believe this. But I'll leave now, or I'm gonna miss my plane.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm just so glad you got to see the babies.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Me too. Oh, I'm just sorry I'm not gonna be around to watch you two attempt to handle this! Alright, I can't say goodbye to you guys again. I love you all so much.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Call us when you get there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I will. Ross, come here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just want you to know.. Last night.. I'll never forget it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Neither will I.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, now I really have to go. Okay. Au revoir! Oh, they're gonna really hate me over there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, you just let her go?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, maybe that's for the best.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. You know? You just... Look, you gotta... You gotta think about last night the way she does, okay? Maybe, maybe sleeping together was the perfect way to say goodbye?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But now she'll never know how he feels!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe that's okay. You know? Maybe, maybe it is better this way? I mean, now, now you can move on. I mean, you've been trying to for so long, maybe now that you're on different continents.. Right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe now you can actually do it. You know? You can finally get over her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, that's true. Except I don't wanna get over her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't! I wanna be with her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm gonna go after her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you are!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Woo!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait, wait! Get your coat! Get your coat!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My coat...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is so cool!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I have no idea what's going on, but I am excited!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But Ross, Ross. What do you, what do you think she's going to say?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know, but I.. Look, even if she shoots me down, at least I won't spend the rest of my life wondering what would have happened. Where - where is my coat?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You didn't bring one! My cab's downstairs, I'll drive you to the airport.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, guys, wish me luck.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hurry!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good luck, good luck!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There's no seatbelt!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's okay. If - if we hit anything, the engine will explode, so you know, it's better if you're thrown from the car.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Alright, alright, let's do this!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: 18th and East End.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I - I don't take passengers.

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Hey! The law says you have to accept any fare.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, you don't understand. This isn't a real cab.

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Alright, I gotta report you. What's your medallion number?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My medallion number is, "Get out of the cab!"

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Get out of the cab!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Get out of the cab!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey, hey, can I give you guys your house-warming present now?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now, that you can do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah... Chick Jr.? Duck Jr.? Don't hide from mama!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You can open your eyes now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are we off the bridge?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is the old woman on the bicycle still alive?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, she jumped right back up.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God, Phoebe, slow down!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Do you wanna get to Rachel in time?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, but I don't wanna die in your cab!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You should have thought of that before you got in!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Toll-booth.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Toll-booth! Four bucks. There are quarters in the glove compartment.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hurry!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Damn, that window is clean.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, tweet, quack...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We were wondering what was taking so long with the gift, but now we understand you were doing this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, I wanted to surprise you, but for your house-warming gift, I got you a baby-chick and a baby-duck!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? You got us a chick and a duck?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, great! Just what you want for a new house with infants. Bird feces.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, they must have jumped off the table, 'cause now they're gone!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, don't worry, we'll find them.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Actually, I'm gonna go check on the twins.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God! What did I just step on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's okay, it's just an egg roll.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh..

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You stepped on my egg roll?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I didn't know to look for Chinese food on the floor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just put it on a plate and leave.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, let's find these birds.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait, wait. Do you hear that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! They're in the table!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, that can't be good!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We gotta get them out of there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, oh! Maybe we can lure them out. You know any birdcalls?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, tons, I'm quite the woodsman.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, maybe we can just tip the table a little.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey, wait! The ball!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh God! So what do we do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know. Maybe we can open this up somehow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No... It's all glued together.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Does that mean we have to bust it open?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know. Maybe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know! It's.. It's the foosball table.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, you know what? We don't have a choice. It's like I would have said in that sci-fi movie if I'd gotten the part. "Those are our men in there, we have to get them out! Even if I have to sacrifice the most important thing in my life; my time-machine."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did that movie ever get made?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It did not.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: To talk to Rachel, isn't that why we took a ride in the death-cab?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? What are you just gonna walk up to her at the gate? Have you never chased anyone through the airport before?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not since my cop-show got cancelled.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You have to get a ticket to get past security.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? We're never gonna make it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Not with that attitude! Now, haul ass!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, if you could all walk slower, that'd be great.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! I was so afraid I wasn't gonna remember any of my high-school French, but I understood every word you just said!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, shoot. I had it. Oh, I can't believe this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I have it, I have it, I have it. Oh, okay, I can't find it, but I remember that I was in seat 32C, because that's my bra-size.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, fine! But you know what? If I was in 36D, we would not be having this problem.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I need a ticket.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Just one? I drive you all the way down here, and I don't get to see how it works out?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine, two tickets, I need two tickets.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We're on our honeymoon.

utterance.speaker: Ticket agent
utterance.content: And the destination?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't care. Whatever is the cheapest.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm so lucky I married you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Shoot! Damn it! Where is it? Oh! Oh! I found it! I found it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hah! I found it! I told you I would find it! In your face! You're a different person.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, flight 421 to Paris. I don't see it, do you see it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, did we miss it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no. That's impossible. It doesn't leave for another 20 minutes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe we have the flight-number wrong. God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, it's me. Here's Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Hey, hey, listen..

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Ross, you wouldn't believe the cute little noises the twins are making. Listen.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry. Shoot, they were doing it before.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's alright. Listen, listen.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, wait, wait, wait! Here they go again.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Isn't that cute?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That is precious! Listen! I need Rachel's flight information.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Alright, it's flight 421. Leaves at 8:40.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, that's what I have. It's not on the board.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's what it says here. Flight 421, leaves at 8:40, Newark airport.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Newark airport. Why, where are you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: JFK.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't worry, you guys, we're gonna get you out of there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And we're also gonna buy you tiny, bird hearing-aids.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Here goes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What's the matter?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I need to say goodbye to the table first.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I understand.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Table, you have given us so many great times. And you guys, Jordan, Victor, Joel... All of you guys. What can I say? You guys make us look good. You wanna say anything?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know. Except that, for one last time... Good game, good game, good game, good game, good game, good game, good game.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, here we go. I can't do it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I can't do it either.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Did you find them?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, they're stuck inside the table!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We have to bust it open, but neither of us can do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, well sure. This gotta be so hard. I'll do it. Gimme!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe! Wow! No, no, no!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I've never gone this fast before.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, forget it, okay? Newark is - is like an hour away. There's no way we're gonna make it in time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She's got her cell, you could call her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am not doing this over the phone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You don't have any other choice!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel? Oh, good. Hey, by the way, did you just get on the plane?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: For what it's worth, we would have caught her if we were at the right airport.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh, Rach, hang on.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe? Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uhm, actually no. No, you've... You have to get off the plane.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I have this feeling that something's wrong with it. Something is wrong with the left Philange.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, honey, I'm sure there's nothing wrong with the plane.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, look, I have to go. I love you, and I will call you the minute I get to Paris.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that was just my crazy friend. She told me I should get off the plane, because she had a feeling that there was something wrong with the left Philange.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I wouldn't worry about it. She's always coming up with stuff like this, and you know what? She's almost never right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Air stewardess
utterance.content: Excuse me, sir, where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Could I get some peanuts?

utterance.speaker: Air stewardess
utterance.content: There's nothing wrong with the plane.

utterance.speaker: Air stewardess
utterance.content: There is no Philange!

utterance.speaker: Air stewardess
utterance.content: Ma'am, please sit down!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: This is ridiculous! I...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright. My job here is done.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was... Impressive.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you didn't even use the tools for most of it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, they were just slowing me down. Alright, I have to get back to the babies. I'll see you girls later.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sorry about the table, man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You gonna buy a new one?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Probably not. Nah. I don't know how much I'm gonna wanna play after you go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, at least we got these little guys out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aww, we were worried about you! Hm. I guess I better get used to things crapping in my hand, huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm gonna miss these little guys. It was nice having birds around again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, you know what? Maybe we should keep them here with you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I mean we've got a lot going on right now. And, plus, here they'd have their own room.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I could get a goose!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know, I - I think you're set with the poultry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks man. Did you hear that, you guys? You're gonna get to stay here! And, and it's good, you know, 'cause, 'cause now you have a reason to come visit.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think there may be another reason. So, awkward hug or lame cool guy handshake?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, lame cool guy handshake, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Where is she?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't see her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel! Rachel Green!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There she is!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel! Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, I just have to talk to someone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no, but...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: RACHEL!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God... What.. What are you guys doing here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, you're on.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? What? Ross, you're scaring me. What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, the thing is..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Don't go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Please, please stay with me. I am so in love with you. Please, don't go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, I know. I shouldn't have waited 'till now to say it, but I'm.. That was stupid, okay? I'm sorry, but I'm telling you now. I love you. Do not get on this plane.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, hey. I know you love me. I know you do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I - I have to get on the plane.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, you don't.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, I do.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, you don't.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: They're waiting for me, Ross. I can't do this right now, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I really thought she'd stay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, that's it. Everything's packed.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow, this is weird.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Uh, does this mean there's nothing to eat?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I put three lasagnas in your freezer.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I love you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So did you guys make it in time?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, he talked to her, but she got on the plane anyway.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where's Ross?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He went home. He didn't want to see anybody.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, hi. It's me. I just got back on the plane. And I just feel awful. That is so not how I wanted things to end with us. It's just that I wasn't expecting to see you, and all of a sudden you're there and saying these things... And... And now I'm just sitting here and thinking of all the stuff I should have said, and I didn't. I mean, I didn't even get to tell you that I love you too. Because of course I do. I love you. I love you. I love you. What am I doing? I love you! Oh, I've gotta see you. I've gotta get off this plane.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Air stewardess
utterance.content: Miss? Please, sit down!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry. I'm really sorry, but I need to get off the plane, okay? I need to tell someone that I love love them.

utterance.speaker: Air stewardess
utterance.content: Miss, I can't let you off the plane.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Let her off the plane!

utterance.speaker: Air stewardess
utterance.content: I am afraid you are gonna have to take a seat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, please, miss, you don't understand!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Try to understand!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on, miss, isn't there any way that you can just let me off...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No! Oh my God. Did she get off the plane? Did she get off the plane?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I got off the plane.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You got off the plane.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I do love you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I love you too, and I'm never letting you go again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. 'Cause this is where I wanna be, okay? No more messing around. I don't wanna mess this up again.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Me neither, okay? We are - we're done being stupid.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. You and me, alright? This is it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This is it. Unless we're on a break.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Don't make jokes now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, please be careful with that. It was my grandmother's. Be careful.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: If that falls off the truck, it wouldn't be the worst thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. It seems smaller somehow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Has it always been purple?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look around, you guys. This was your first home. And it was a happy place, filled with love and laughter. But more important, because of rent control, it was a friggin' steal!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, do you realise that at one time or another we all lived in this apartment?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, that's true.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, I haven't.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute. What about that summer during college that you lived with grandma, and you tried to make it as a dancer?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you realise we almost made it ten years without that coming up?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, honey, I forgot. I promised Treeger that we'd leave our keys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, I guess this is it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. I guess so.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is harder than I thought it would be.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, it's gonna be okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you guys have to go to the new house right away, or do you have some time?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We got some time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, should we get some coffee?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure. Where?
